sentences.sentence: "We have special receptors on our retinas, called photoreceptive ganglion cells."
sentences.translation: 我们眼睛视网膜有种特殊受体，叫做受光体神经中枢细胞。

sentences.sentence: The authors engineered mice to express high levels of miR-17 ~ 92 in their retinas.
sentences.translation: 作者构建了视网膜中miR - 17 ~ 92高水平表达的工程鼠。

sentences.sentence: We happen to have a lot of cryptochrome in our retinas-ideally situated to receive light.
sentences.translation: 我们正好拥有许多隐色素位于我们的视网膜中——一个完美的接受光线的位置。
